msbt.message: I don't know how he knew, but I got EXACTLY what I wanted from Santa yesterday, .Hang onI bet it was the letters I've been sending every single day since March. Yay! Santa read them!
I was so happy about getting a gift from Santa that I could hardly sleep last night, .But then I opened my gift and my face did a huge smile. Just like this!
Did you have fun at the gift exchange yesterday? 'Cause I sure did. I had lots of fun, !Hey, let's trade Toy Day gifts next year too. Oh! And maybe we could also trade gifts on all the other days!
Thanks for the gift yesterday. Did you know you're amazing at Toy Day? 'Cause you are, !I wanna be amazing at Toy Day too, so I'm gonna start thinking about next year's Toy Day giftsNOW.
What a Toy Day! I got a gift from Santa, and I got a gift from you. It was amazing, !And the best part? The sound the wrapping paper made. It sounded just like eating potato chips!
I love the gift you got me. You're the best. Oh! I got a gift from Santa too. He's also the best, .Hey, how's it feel to be co-best with Santa? I bet it feels like warm marmalade between your toes.

Wanna hear the secret to having a great Toy Day?First, take a walk. Second, eat a big breakfast. Next, nap until lunchtime. After lunch, play with your toys.Yes, that IS what I do every day. That's 'cause I'm always practicing for Toy Day, !

I heard if you wanna be real nice to Santa, you should eat some cookies for him. So I ate cookies last night.I don't get how that makes any sense at all, but wasn't gonna turn down cookies. I just hope he liked it.
